## Reading

Prediction

Los Campos, Gustavo de, Ana Ines Vazquez, Stephen Hsu, and Louis Lello. 2018. “Complex-Trait Prediction in the Era of Big Data.” Trends in Genetics: TIG 34 (10): 746–54.

PRS
